meanings.sent1: She yerked the door open when she heard the bell ring.
meanings.sent2: The cat yerked away when it saw the dog approaching.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel yerked up the tree when it heard a loud noise.
meanings.sent4: The wind yerked the leaves off the trees in a wild dance.
meanings.sent5: He yerked his arm out to catch the falling book.

meanings.sent1: He yerked the ball with all his might, sending it flying across the field.
meanings.sent2: The boxer yerked his opponent with a powerful punch.
meanings.sent3: She yerked the pinata, causing the candies to scatter everywhere.
meanings.sent4: The hammer yerked against the nail, driving it deep into the wood.
meanings.sent5: The chef yerked the knife down, swiftly slicing through the vegetables.
